hero.title: CRM? That's just the beginning. Unlock real actionable insights with Customer Intelligence.
hero.description: Oddle's customer intelligence layer empowers your restaurant with comprehensive marketing and operational insights, enabling effortless personalised marketing and operational excellence.

marketingHeader.title: Marketing Intelligence
marketingHeader.description: The answers you've been missing from your CRM. Say goodbye to guesswork and hello to actionable answers - Uncover valuable insights from your own customer data and make informed decisions with confidence.

discover.title: Discover, Segment, Target
discover.description: Unlock the insights you need to power your marketing strategy. Discover your customer breakdown and target the right segment with the right message.

completeData.title: Complete customer data at your fingertips
completeData.description: Dive into comprehensive customer data, spanning from transaction history across deliveries, reservations, survey results and even their interactions with your digital touchpoints.

opsHeader.title: Operational Intelligence
opsHeader.description: Be the smartest host, turn every reservation into a connection. Oddle collects all your data in one convenient location, making it easy to access information on dietary requirements, guest visits, and interactions across different outlets. With just one click, you can view a comprehensive guest history that helps you better understand and serve your customers.

description.title: Driving Profitable Growth for Restaurants, Sustainably
description.subtitle: Founded in 2014, Oddle is a Singapore-based, food tech company that offers a vertically integrated suite of solutions to help restaurants manage and grow their sales. Oddle has a presence in Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan and Hong Kong, and is trusted by over 10,000 F&B brands globally.

hero.title: Transparent Pricing, Powerful Solutions
hero.description: Choose the plan that best fits your restaurant's needs and budget. No hidden fees, just straightforward pricing for industry-leading tools.

plans.title: Find Your Perfect Fit
plans.annualBillingDiscount: Save up to 20% with annual billing

planDetails.name: Essential
planDetails.description: For new restaurants getting started with online ordering and basic management.

planDetails.name: Growth
planDetails.description: For growing restaurants looking to optimize operations and engage customers.

planDetails.name: Pro
planDetails.description: For established restaurants needing comprehensive solutions and premium support.

items.name: Advanced Marketing Suite
items.description: Unlock powerful tools for targeted campaigns, automation, and deeper customer insights.

items.name: Loyalty Program Module

items.name: Premium Integrations Pack
items.description: Seamlessly connect with a wider range of third-party accounting, POS, and delivery services.

items.question: Is there a free trial available?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for our Growth plan. No credit card required to get started.

items.question: Can I change my plan later?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time to suit your evolving business needs.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards and bank transfers for annual subscriptions in Malaysia.

items.question: Are there any setup fees?
items.answer: No, there are no setup fees for any of our standard plans. We believe in transparent pricing.

items.question: What kind of support is included?
items.answer: All plans come with standard email support. Growth and Pro plans include priority support and dedicated account management respectively.

cta.title: Still Have Questions or Need a Custom Solution?
cta.description: Our team is here to help. Contact us for a personalized consultation to discuss your specific requirements.
